Package helper

Class FirstLevelDivisionQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.FirstLevelDivisionQuery
public abstract class FirstLevelDivisionQuery extends Object
This class creates methods for querying the first_level_divisions table in the database.

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> selectAllFLD() throws SQLException
      The method for querying the first-level-divisions table in the database. The method selects all divisions from the table and creates First-Level-Division objects.

      ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • setFldByCountry

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> setFldByCountry(int countryId) throws SQLException
      The method for querying the first-level-divisions table in the database by country ID. The method selects all divisions from the table with a specific country ID and populates and observable list.

    • selectFLDByDivisionId

      public static String selectFLDByDivisionId(int divId) throws SQLException
      The method for querying the first-level-divisions table in the database by division ID. The method selects specific division from the table and returns it in a string.
      Parameters:
      divId -
      Returns:
      The string of the selected First-Level-Division object.
